Creator: ISO/IEC MPEG Audio Committee
Proprietary implementations (codecs): FAAC (encoding only), iTunes, Nero Digital Audio
Open-source implementations (codecs): FAAD2 (decoding only), FFmpeg, Android OpenCORE AAC (decoding only), Audiocogs (decoding only)

Creator: Dolby Laboratories
Open-source implementations (codecs): FFmpeg, liba52 (decoding only), Aften (encoding only), libavc (2.0 channels max)
Application (besides consumer audio): Theatrical movie presentation, Digital TV service & home-video (personal recorders, DVD, etc.)

Creator: Digital Voice Systems
Application (besides consumer audio): Low bandwidth HF/VHF digital radio, VoIP trunking

Creator: 3GPP
Open-source implementations (codecs): FFmpeg (decoding only), FFmpeg with OpenCORE libraries, Android

Creator: 3GPP
Open-source implementations (codecs): FFmpeg (decoding only), FFmpeg with VisualOn libraries, Android (decoding only), opencore-amr for both encoding and decoding

Creator: APTX
Proprietary implementations (codecs): Broadcast audio codecs: Systembase, APT, AVT, Harris Corporation, MAYAH, Prodys, Qbit; wireless headphones: iSkin, JayBird Gear, DTS discs for movies
Application (besides consumer audio): Low latency Studio/transmitter link, Bluetooth A2DP stereo, digital wireless microphone

Creator: Sony Corp.
Proprietary implementations (codecs): MiniDisc, Walkman, VAIO, Clie, PlayStation 3, PlayStation Portable, SDDS, SonicStage, SoundForge, RealPlayer, ConnectPlayer
Open-source implementations (codecs): FFmpeg (decoding only, ATRAC Advanced Lossless are not supported)

Creator: Broadcom
Application (besides consumer audio): Speech, VoIP, Low latency, voice recording

Creator: Xiph.Org Foundation, Jean-Marc Valin
Open-source implementations (codecs): libcelt, FFmpeg with libcelt library (decoding only)
Application (besides consumer audio): Speech, VoIP, Low latency, Studio/transmitter link, wireless audio

Creator: David Rowe
Application (besides consumer audio): Low bandwidth HF/VHF digital radio, VoIP trunking

Creator: Dolby Laboratories
Application (besides consumer audio): Theatrical movie presentation, digital TV service & home-video (personal recorders, DVD, etc.)

Creator: Xiph.Org Foundation, Josh Coalson
Open-source implementations (codecs): FLAC, Flake (encoding only), FFmpeg, FLACCL (encoding only), Audiocogs (decoding only)

Creator: ITU-T
Open-source implementations (codecs): FFmpeg, Ekiga, Asterisk (PBX) and almost any VoIP software

Creator: ITU-T (adopted directly from 3GPP)
Open-source implementations (codecs): FFmpeg (decoding only), FFmpeg with VisualOn libraries, Android (decoding only)

Creator: ITU-T
Open-source implementations (codecs): FFmpeg, Ekiga and other VoIP software

Creator: ETSI Special Mobile Group
Open-source implementations (codecs): FFmpeg (decoding only), FFmpeg with external library libgsm, Ekiga and other VoIP software

Creator: Global IP Solutions
Proprietary implementations (codecs): Cisco IP Communicator, old versions of Skype
Open-source implementations (codecs): Ekiga, Asterisk (PBX) and other VoIP software, FFmpeg with libilbc library

Creator: ISO/IEC MPEG Audio Committee
Proprietary implementations (codecs): various DVD software, video software, audio software

Creator: ISO/IEC MPEG Audio Committee
Proprietary implementations (codecs): FhG, l3enc, MP3enc, (old implementations: Xing TOMPG, SCMPX)
Open-source implementations (codecs): LAME (encoding only), FFmpeg (decoding only), libmad (decoding only), Audiocogs (decoding only), (old implementations: BladeEnc)

Creator: IETF
Application (besides consumer audio): Speech, VoIP, Low latency, Studio/transmitter link, wireless audio

Creator: Nippon Telegraph and Telephone
Proprietary implementations (codecs): Winamp with VQF plugin, NTT TwinVQ player/encoder, Yamaha SoundVQ player, Nero Media Player

Creator: Microsoft
Player cost: Free for licensees of the Windows operating system
Proprietary implementations (codecs): Windows Media Player, Windows Media Encoder
Open-source implementations (codecs): FFmpeg (decoding only for Pro, Lossless and Voice)
